# Getting ready for the field

Checking out gear:

# Equipment Checklist

-   Personal items:

    -   waders
    -   wading boots

    -   hat
    -   notebook and pen/pencil

-   Streamflow measurement gear:

    -   tapemeasure (at least 1)
